segments.text: Would you like your bags to be taken to your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll get the bellman to taka them up . Which bags are yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My luggage is in the corner over there . They are the leather suitcase , the canvass holdall and the blue backpack .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please be careful with the suitcase , it's very heavy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll let the bellboy know . Don't worry , he's very strong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the holdall has some fragile items inside , so please be careful with that too .
segments.speaker: S2
